imageAssets.description: Subtle, abstract game background for a Breakout-style game. Light theme focus. Soft, light blue and light grey geometric patterns or a gentle gradient. Non-distracting, clean, and modern. Should evoke a sense of digital space. Avoid strong, dark colors.
imageAssets.purpose: Game area background image, to be used as CSS background for #game-container or drawn on canvas.

imageAssets.description: Player paddle sprite for Breakout. Sleek, slightly rounded rectangular bar. Primary color: Bootstrap blue (#0d6efd) with a subtle lighter blue highlight on top edge for a slight 3D effect. Clean, flat design. Dimensions for sprite: approx 100px width, 20px height.

Game ball sprite for Breakout. Perfect circle. Bright, energetic orange color (#fd7e14) with a small white specular highlight to suggest roundness. Stands out well against light backgrounds. Diameter for sprite: approx 20px.

Standard brick sprite for Breakout. Rectangle. Color: light grey (#ced4da from Bootstrap) with a very subtle inset shadow or top/left edge highlight to give a hint of depth. Clean. Dimensions for sprite: approx 60px width, 20px height.

Strong brick sprite (2-hit variant) for Breakout. Same dimensions as standard brick (approx 60x20px). Color: a slightly more robust light blue (#cfe2ff from Bootstrap). Subtle visual difference like a hairline crack pattern or slightly thicker border to indicate it's tougher than standard brick. Maintain light theme.
imageAssets.purpose: Strong brick sprite (for 2-hit bricks, initial state).

imageAssets.description: Power-up brick sprite for Breakout. Same dimensions as standard brick (approx 60x20px). Color: a light, friendly green (#d1e7dd from Bootstrap) with a simple white star icon or 'P' symbol in the center. Clearly indicates it will drop a power-up.
Icon for 'Large Paddle' power-up. A stylized wider version of the player paddle sprite (Bootstrap blue #0d6efd). Simple, clear, and recognizable at small size (e.g., 24x24px or 32x32px).
imageAssets.purpose: Power-up icon for 'Large Paddle', used in UI and as falling item.

imageAssets.description: Icon for 'Multi-ball' power-up. Three small orange (#fd7e14) circles, similar to the game ball, clustered together. Simple, clear, and recognizable at small size (e.g., 24x24px or 32x32px).
imageAssets.purpose: Power-up icon for 'Multi-ball', used in UI and as falling item.

imageAssets.description: Icon for 'Sticky Paddle' power-up. A stylized player paddle (Bootstrap blue #0d6efd) with a small ball (orange #fd7e14) appearing to be 'stuck' on its top surface, perhaps with a subtle 'magnetic field' or 'goo' effect. Simple, clear, and recognizable at small size (e.g., 24x24px or 32x32px).
imageAssets.purpose: Power-up icon for 'Sticky Paddle', used in UI and as falling item.
